title: Chairman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Hold a gathering, preventing all deaths from happening for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Attacked players will be put on special trial simultaneously at the beginning of the following day.
- Players choose to vote or not vote on every player on trial. Votes are anonymous, however if a player is hanged, the factions of the players who voted are revealed (neutral killing/evil/benign/chaos are included)
- The attack level determines how many votes a player needs to be hanged, regardless of defence level.
Basic, 1/2 of living players
Powerful, 1/4 of living players
Unstoppable, 1/8 of living players
Overkill, 1 vote
- At the end of the day, if a player on special trial reaches the vote threshold, they are hanged.
- A regular trial can still happen during the day and functions as normal
- You may hold a gathering three times.
